title: Shop Smart, Save Money
overview: This entertaining and ambitious series reveals some of the tips and tricks that can help British shoppers get the very best value for their money. Each week, presenters will head out into the public to offer up cash-saving advice - and help viewers at home make sense of the often confusing deals and offers available across the country today. As part of the series, two shoppers will also be challenged each episode to save as much as possible on their family's weekly shop.
